sentences.en: A party dress is inappropriate for a hike.
sentences.cn: 社交聚会礼服不适合徒步旅行时穿.

sentences.en: Any team using an inappropriate name or logo also excluded.
sentences.cn: 任何参赛队的不适当名字和logo也被禁止.

sentences.en: I feel the remark was inappropriate for such a serious issue.
sentences.cn: 我认为对如此严肃的问题来说，该评论不合时宜。

sentences.en: I'm sorry for eavesdropping, but don't you think your conversation is a little inappropriate?
sentences.cn: 抱歉我听到你们的谈话你们不觉得你们的对话有点不合时宜 吗 ?

sentences.en: Idioms that have become accepted on a PC are completely inappropriate on an embedded device.
sentences.cn: 一些适合桌面计算机的术语可能完全不能用在嵌入系统中.

sentences.en: It is inappropriate to draw such a parallel.
It was felt inappropriate by some that such a serious occasion should include dancing.
sentences.cn: 有些人认为在如此庄重的场合跳舞实在是不妥.

sentences.en: It'seems inappropriate for us to intervene at this stage.
sentences.cn: 我们在此阶段介入似不甚妥.

sentences.en: Someone took an inappropriate use of words on my part and tried to blow it into a major controversy.
sentences.cn: 有人不适当地引用我的话，想借此把事情闹大。

sentences.en: The chief objection to the essay is its inappropriate use of special jargons.
sentences.cn: 这篇文章的主要缺点是专门术语用得不当.

sentences.en: There is no suggestion that clients have been sold inappropriate policies.
sentences.cn: 无迹象表明向客户售出了不适用的保险。

sentences.en: This treatment was singularly inappropriate in her case.
sentences.cn: 就她的情况来说这种治疗方法极不适合.

sentences.en: To me this name seems inappropriate.
sentences.cn: 这个术语我觉得不适当.

sentences.en: Your short skirt is inappropriate for a formal party.
sentences.cn: 你穿这条短裙去参加正式晚会是不恰当的.

trans.tran_cn: 不恰当的，不适宜的，不合适，不宜，不妥
trans.tran_en: not suitable or right for a particular purpose or in a particular situation
